dmca.title: Web DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Hi,

We are sorry to report that your members have posted images that breach the copyright of our World Guide sites.

Therefore, we wish to issue the following DMCA complaint;

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The images copied are as follows:

http://www.investorzclub.com/2011/11/egypt-rating-downgraded-to-b.html
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4gYczQOqzLs/Ts5p-lyrIBI/AAAAAAAAAl8/UWMzZBWNHG8/s200/egypt_map1.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4gYczQOqzLs/Ts5p-lyrIBI/AAAAAAAAAl8/UWMzZBWNHG8/s1600/egypt_map1.jpg
http://yarnandsuitcases.blogspot.co.uk/2010/08/in-which-we-look-at-some-maps.html
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_rtYR72wglfY/THwVNsKr71I/AAAAAAAAAA8/Dw4moou-PmA/s320/Egypt.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_rtYR72wglfY/THwVNsKr71I/AAAAAAAAAA8/Dw4moou-PmA/s1600/Egypt.jpg
http://pagarmuseh.blogspot.co.uk/2012/07/dr-mohammad-moursi-presiden-mesir-2012.html
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G8qQJ8jOUlw/T_V9MI9AlJI/AAAAAAAAAyc/wI74zOdubx8/s320/egypt_map1.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-G8qQJ8jOUlw/T_V9MI9AlJI/AAAAAAAAAyc/wI74zOdubx8/s1600/egypt_map1.jpg
http://texas-map.blogspot.co.uk/2012/05/map-of-dallas-city-pictures.html
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JIKXJjyuc00/Ta9WCrVnf6I/AAAAAAAAAuc/Jw3WPMxM3oQ/s1600/map-of-dallas.jpg
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pieHhTZx1Bo/Ta9WCFixobI/AAAAAAAAAuM/3fIiTuGWtWc/s1600/map_of_dallas.jpg


3. The original images can be viewed here:

http://www.egypt.world-guides.com/
http://www.world-guides.com/images/egypt/egypt_map1.jpg
http://www.dallas.world-guides.com/dallas_maps.html
http://www.world-guides.com/images/dallas/map1_dallas.jpg
http://www.world-guides.com/images/dallas/dallas_map.jpg

4.  Contact: [redacted] - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +[redacted]
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: [redacted], Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by World Guides.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials.


Many thanks once again for your help, please advise if you require any further information.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.

MARTIN
